column2: # to draw multiple histograms in the same plot, calculate first, plot later
# get sensible range of histogram breaks:
breaks=seq(-30, 30, by=0.5),    # range should depend on data
l <- function(x, a=.4) adjustcolor(x, alpha.f=a)   # make colours see-through
plot(1,1, type="n", main="PairLL", xlab="LLR(FS/U)", ylab="Count", las=1,
